sentences.en: Coolant temperature and ambient air pressure may be used to optimize cold starting and altitude performance.
sentences.cn: 冷却水温度和大气压力可用于使冷起动性能和高原性能最优化.

sentences.en: In order to optimize the process, formulation of objective function is necessary.
sentences.cn: 为了使过程最优化, 目标函数的公式是必不可少的.

sentences.en: In some specialized products, it is appropriate to optimize the user experience for experts.
sentences.cn: 在某些产品中, 为专家优化用户体验是合适的.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To optimize the water immersion extraction technology of Kunzaotiaozhi capsules.
sentences.cn: 目的: 优选昆藻调脂胶囊的最佳水提工艺.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To optimize conditions for extracting flavonoid compounds from Sophora alopecuroides L.
sentences.cn: 目的优化苦豆子中黄酮的最佳提取工艺.

sentences.en: Objective: To optimize the extraction process of Bushen Tongbi Granuls.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的: 优选补肾通痹颗粒提取工艺.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo optimize the technologies of processing in Heshouwu braised.
sentences.cn: 目的优化黑豆汁炖何首乌炮制工艺.

sentences.en: Optimize inventory management skills and operation way of working.
sentences.cn: 优化存货管理能力以及工作方式.

sentences.en: Optimize sovereign applications for full - screen use.
sentences.cn: 全屏幕使用独占应用,让它发挥最优效果.

sentences.en: Optimize the structure of forestry planting, and gradually deceleration Eucalyptus cultivation.
sentences.cn: 优化林业种植结构, 逐步调减速生桉种植面积.

sentences.en: The companies merged to optimize the allocation of resources.
sentences.cn: 为了优化资源配置,这几家公司并产了.

sentences.en: They need to optimize the use of available resources.
sentences.cn: 他们需要充分利用手上的资源。

sentences.en: to optimize the use of resources
We must optimize the opportunities for better understanding.
sentences.cn: 我们必须充分利用机会作更进一步的了解.

sentences.en: We should optimize our import mix and focus on bringing in advanced technology and key equipment.
sentences.cn: 优化进口结构,着重引进先进技术和关键设备.

sentences.en: Withdrawal of state - owned stock helps optimize share - h olding structure of listed company.
sentences.cn: 国有股 退出有利于上市公司股权结构的优化.

trans.tran_en: to improve the way that something is done or used so that it is as effective as possible

trans.tran_cn: 使最优化，使尽可能有效
